property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jon Snow is participating, either: stand each attacking Wildling character, or stand each defending [thenightswatch] character. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: During [intrigue] challenges, each Steward character you control gains insight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Old Bear Mormont is participating, choose a non-unique character in the losing opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Cotter Pyke bypasses a character using stealth, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose a [thenightswatch] character and have it gain stealth until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent and a challenge type that has not been initiated against you this phase. That player must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to marshal Grizzled Miner by 1 for each [thenightswatch] attachment and location you control (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Denys Mallister is defending, he gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each other Ranger character you control gains a [power] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel 2 Builder characters to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location or attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Grenn is attacking, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to another attacking [thenightswatch] character. (Up to 2 power instead if that character is standing.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyp is attacking, choose another attacking [thenightswatch] character. That character gains insight until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Samwell Tarly is participating in a challenge, treat each other participating non-Steward character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Satin is knelt, choose and stand another Steward character. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you control no other Ranger characters, sacrifice Lost Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you attach an attachment to Seasoned Woodsman, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Builder at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] attachment or location you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Steward character to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.) Challenges Action: Kneel a Steward character to draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Abandoned Stronghold to choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of Builder characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Queenscrown to reveal the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose up to 1 character revealed this way and place it in that player's discard pile. Place the other cards on the bottom of that player's deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Catapult on the Wall and attached character to choose and kill an attacking character with STR 4 or lower. Attached character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: [thenightswatch] or [stark] character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed, return Ghost to your hand to save that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation. While attached character has: - a [military] icon, it gains the Ranger trait. - an [intrigue] icon, it gains the Steward trait. - a [power] icon, it gains the Builder trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character with printed cost 5 or lower is placed in an opponent's discard pile, put that character into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, kneel 3 Builder characters, 3 Ranger characters, or 3 Steward characters to end the challenge immediately with no winner or loser.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character is bypassed using stealth, pay 1 gold to kneel it. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control Ser Davos Seaworth, he gains renown. Action: Kneel Black Betha to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of kneeling characters the defending player controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Sacrifice Salt Wife to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel a Warship location to choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent, and place it on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play under your control, Ulf Son of Umar gets +X STR until the end of the phase. X is that character's printed STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

card.name: There Are No Men Like Me

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a Knight character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker or defender in a [military] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Southron Messenger enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons, and return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, place a venom token on Lingering Venom. Then, if attached character's STR is equal to or lower than the number of venom tokens on Lingering Venom, kill it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Sacrifice Jeyne Poole to return a Lady character from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique [stark] character only. Action: Kneel attached character to have it participate in a [military] challenge on your side. (Limit once per challenge.) Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Summer to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments. Dothraki Honor Guard gets -1 STR for each card in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Plaza of Pride and discard a card from your hand to choose and stand a character with printed cost X or lower. X is 3 higher than the printed cost of the discarded card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Jon Fossoway's STR is 5 or higher, he gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, The Honeywine gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Rattleshirt is attacking alone, each character without attachments cannot be declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Wildling character enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Crow Killers does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent whose reserve value is higher than yours.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel The Frozen Shore to choose and stand 1 attacking Wildling character for each Winter plot card revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: [thenightswatch] or Wildling character only. Action: Kneel Weirwood Bow to choose a defending character. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent. Return that location to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Put a neutral character into play from your hand. Until the end of the phase, that character gains intimidate. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each [thenightswatch] character you control does not kneel when declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win initiative, you must choose an opponent to be the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After a character without an [intrigue] icon enters play, kneel it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character, put it into play. If it is a non-character card, draw it and gain 2 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character an opponent controls is killed, put it into play under your control. While that character is in play, treat its printed text box as if it were blank. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it in its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Knight character you control is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lord or Lady character you control and have it gain 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character with STR 2 or lower cannot stand.
